reviewText: What can one say about A guy you would think has everything that joins the military .? He is my Hero!. I would have paid top dollar for this stuff. He s the type of actor you can t help admire. My reasons are a little more personal, he looks and acts exactly like my Father. My dad was born in 1925' he faught in the Navy in WW2 (the big one)!. If you're a GABLE fan you got too pick this one up!

This is exactly as described.  I wanted to see Clark Gable during WWII.  It is an excellent depiction of what the B-17 pilots went through during training and combat.  If you want to put yourself back in time to that era this is excellent.
